plays.text: Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Rob Blake
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Roughing Steve Yzerman

Goal scored by Joe Sakic assisted by Greg de Vries and Rob Blake
Penalty to Steve Yzerman 2 minutes for Interference Dan Hinote
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for High Sticking Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Stephane Yelle 2 minutes for Holding Pavel Datsyuk
Goal scored by Chris Drury assisted by Peter Forsberg and Greg de Vries
Goal scored by Brett Hull assisted by Tomas Holmstrom and Chris Chelios
